title: Interview With an Angel
description: This novel, based on true events and characters, is presented as part of the Extra-Ordinary Interview Series. The man in this interview introduces himself as Archangel Gabriel.The book is an in depth discourse and exploration of our divinity, existence and meaning within the Universal Superconscious. Is there a God? Are angels agents of religions? Where do humans originate? Can angels incarnate as humans? How many other species are there in the Universe? All these questions and more are answered in this fascinating conversation.
author: Inelia Benz
